attributes.action: make class discrimination a crime in the same way as racial, gender, religious and sexual discrimination is.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is a growing trend in the United Kingdom to label people by class and to discriminate against people by class. In some circles this is even referred to as a war - class war no less.

In the egalitarian society of modern Britain where it is illegal to discriminate against people by race, gender, religion or sexuality it needs also to be illegal to discriminate against people by class.

To provoke discrimination by class and to incite class war needs to be criminalised.
